summary: Conditions We refer to a recursive function as tail-recursion when the recursive call is the last thing that function executes. Otherwise, it’s known as head-recursion. Iteration will be more complicated and harder to understand compared to recursion, for example: traversing a binary tree. summary: Conditions Prefix sum is a powerful pre-processing/ caching technique for algorithm problems. The idea is to calculate/store the consecutive totals of the elements in an array in O(n). Questions 304 class NumMatrix { // To achieve O(1) time complexity for sumRegion, we can use a precomputation technique called prefix sum.
